summary: Professor of education and culture with a doctorate in "values education" with a bachelor's degree in sociology. In education, training, research and publications I focus specifically on pedagogy, values and society. I have taught in different countries, in multicultural societies and gained experience overseas and I have given seminars and participated in national and international conferences.
